entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @realDonaldTrump @NYCMayor This is a distraction.  New York Governor needs to be brought up on Murder charges. He flooded nursing homes with infected Covid19 patients. This is criminal. He saw what was happening in Washington nursing homes and acted on it to drive up the death toll to justify the lockdown
